vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ki.24.8;
daughter of: Elnathan (H0494); married to Jehoiakim (H3079);
mother of: Jehoiachin (H3078)
§ Nehushta = "brass"
daughter of Elnathan, wife of king Jehoiakim of Judah and mother of king Jehoiachin of Judah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hija de Elnatán; esposa del rey Joaquim
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
尼護施他 这个陰性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "黃銅"
以利拿單的女兒, 猶大王約雅敬的妻子, 猶大王約雅斤的母親 (王下 24:8)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
尼护施他 这个阴性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "黄铜"
以利拿单的女儿, 犹大王约雅敬的妻子, 犹大王约雅斤的母亲 (王下 24:8)
